example.text: financial buyers such as leveraged buy-out firms will be at a disadvantage in obtaining financing

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Drexel , meanwhile , already competes at a disadvantage to its big Wall Street rivals because it has a slightly lower commercial paper rating .
example.arg: to its big Wall Street rivals
